assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Meiko Network Japan Co., Ltd. provides education services in Japan. The company operates individual tutoring cram schools; soccer schools for preschool children, and elementary and junior high school students; and sells classroom fixtures and equipment, teaching materials, tests, and advertising/promotional materials. It also operates Japanese language school; individual English school instructed by bilinguals; after school service; and programming schools, as well as provides recruitment support, education, and training related to employment of foreigners. As of August 31, 2021, it operated 1,767 classrooms. The company was formerly known as Meiko Gijuku Corporation and changed its name to Meiko Network Japan Co., Ltd. in December 1986. Meiko Network Japan Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1982 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
